member.name: ID3D11AuthenticatedChannel.GetCertificate
member.param: The size of the pCertificate array, in bytes. To get the size of the certificate chain, call .
A pointer to a byte array that receives the driver's certificate chain. The caller must allocate the array.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11AuthenticatedChannel.GetCertificateSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the driver's certificate chain.
member.param: Receives the size of the certificate chain, in bytes.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11AuthenticatedChannel.GetChannelHandle
member.summary: Gets a handle to the authenticated channel.
member.param: Receives a handle to the channel.

member.name: ID3D11AuthenticatedChannel
member.summary: Provides a communication channel with the graphics driver or the Microsoft Direct3D runtime.
